title: Penetrating Claus: The Private (and uncensored) Confessions of Toysin Tinkerbottoms
description: When young and inexperienced Toysin Tinkerbottoms manages to land a dream job at Santa's workshop - all is not as it seems when the seductive Mrs. Claus takes a lustful interest in the handsome elf. Will he succumb to the advances of this aged, yet tantalizing and forbidden woman?An erotic fairy tale of the smuttiest order. Why wait until Christmas to unwrap your package?
author: Morgana Loveless
